app_descript:
App Name: Bunch

Brief: Bunch is the ultimate social gaming app that transforms your device into a virtual hangout, allowing you to host or join a digital house party anytime, anywhere. Connect with friends through voice and video chat, dive into games together directly from text messages, and keep track of what everyone is playing. With exclusive Bunch games and support for your favorite third-party titles, gaming with friends has never been so interactive and easy.
